articles.author: Tionah Lee
articles.title: TJ Holmes, Amy Robach Recall How 'Good Morning America' Coworkers Treated Them After Hearing of Their Romance - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: T.J. Holmes and Amy Robach reveal the 'Good Morning America' co-worker who supported them after their romance became public.
articles.content:
T.J. Holmes and Amy Robach had some real -- and fake -- support from their Good Morning America co-workers after news of their private romance came out in 2022. 
On the latest episode of the Amy &am… [+4034 chars]
